main_definition: Thousands refers to the number 1,000 or a count of that many units.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A large quantity, typically used in various expressions and idioms
meanings_and_examples.example: The company made a substantial profit this year, earning thousands.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to describe an approximate or rounded number of items, often as part of counting or estimating
meanings_and_examples.example: There were thousands of people at the concert last night.

meanings_and_examples.definition: As a unit of measurement for weight in certain countries such as China and Japan where it represents 1,000 grams
meanings_and_examples.example: The package weighs two thousand grams or two kilograms.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to express an abstract idea or concept of a large number without specifying the exact count
meanings_and_examples.example: Thousands of stars can be seen in the night sky on a clear evening.
